name: resolidify
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to change from being a liquid or gas back to being a solid form again, or to make something do this: Adding small amounts of water to melted chocolate will cause it to re-solidify. The chocolate chips usually melt during baking, remain soft for several hours, and then resolidify. Related words
solidify
resolidification
More examplesFewer examplesThey found that the rock did resolidify within a few weeks.Place the vial in iced water, wait for the contents to resolidify, then heat the water to 30C, at which point the contents will melt again.The gel was melted on a microscope slide and covered with a cover slip; it was then re-solidified during cooling to fix the sample.
